title: Small Pilates Ball with Pump 9 Inch Mini Bender Ball for Stability Pilates Yoga Barre Physical Therapy Core Training
features: EASY TO INFLATE - This mini exercise ball has an inflation system that is similar to a basketball’s. So it can be easily inflated only with a hand pump. And after the inflation what you need to do is pull out the pump, no stopper needed!(Notice: The hand pump is included and will be random color.And the inflate needle is in the top cap of the hand pump,you can open the top cap and pick it out!!)

NO DEFLATING - Unlike other brand ball which cannot hold air well, our small Pilates ball can effectively hold the air for at least 6 months. You can obviously feel the difference if you give it a try. NO Chemical SMELL - Made of high quality PVC material, it has no any strange smell at all.

ANTI-BURST - Made from professional premium PVC material (which has no nay chemical smell) and has an anti-burst coating that can sustain up to 600 lb of pressure. Our 9 inch yoga ball allows you do any pose without concerns.

EASY TO ADJUST PRESSURE - Come with an extra needle for convenient pressure adjustment. If you feel the ball is too tight, you can deflate the ball with the needle according to your demand. Or if you feel it is too soft, you can inflate it with the hand pump.

HASSLE FREE: We provide a 12-month guarantee! If there is any problem with the ball within 12 months, you can contact us at any time and we will send you a replacement or give you a full refund within 12 hours. No Question Asked!
description: Why Is A Small Exercise Ball Becoming More And More Popular?

1. A smaller ball fits in the natural curve at the bottom of your back called the lumbar spine 2. It fits all lengths of spinal column, short or long, and when you lean back onto it your abdominal curl is far more effective compared to leaning back over a large ball 3. Your body is extended further because the smaller balls have smaller diameter 4. It instantly angle you in the optimum position to obtain the best results from your abdominal workout 5. It give you a better range of motion so you receive a significant boost when crunching your abs
What Advantages Does FreeSouls Small Exercise Ball Has Compare to Other Brands?

* Better Inflation System - Unlike the other brand balls that use cheap straws to blow up, ours have an better inflation system that likes a basketball’s, they use a hand pump to inflate, which can stay inflated better and longer * Come With a Hand Pump - You do not need to extra buy the hand pump, it comes with the ball * Regular Shape - No any air lose during inflation, so the shape of the ball can always stay beautiful round * No Chemical Smell - The balls are made of high quality PVC material, which has no any strange smell * Higher Quality But Lower Price - They are thicker, softer and with more reasonable price, You can obviously feel the difference if you give them a try
Do not hesitate, just buy it with confidence, you won’t be regret for your choice!
